description:
Within the Chief`s castle Tetsuro learns of some sort of secret and sees Maetel being subservient to the Chief. He tries to save her but is almost sent flying out into space. Tetsugoro, livid after finding out that his former lover was killed, plants a bomb on the Chief`s castle. Tetsuro has to save Maetel in the five minutes before the bomb detonates!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyuujou Juutaku Dan no Daishuuchou Kouhen
The Chief of the Spherical Housing Complex: Part Two
球状住宅団の大酋長 後編
